items.summary: Pic is WAY different then the real thing
items.text: Pic is WAY different then the real thing! My mom wouldn't even wear these there so ugly! Can I give a 0 rating?

items.summary: Meh, I'm not hating them, but I'm not in
items.text: Meh, I'm not hating them, but I'm not in love. The eyelet part looks way different online and the elastic band felt really tight. They are pretty comfy other than that.

items.summary: I'm a mom on the go and I love these sho
items.text: I'm a mom on the go and I love these shoes! They're comfy, cute and easy to slip on. What more could you ask for?

items.summary: I am in love with these shoes and will b
items.text: I am in love with these shoes and will buy them until they don't make them anymore. I run every day in them and I'm still on my first pair after a whole year. They're SO comfy.

items.summary: Design is adorable-when you have cute wo
items.text: Design is adorable-when you have cute workout gear, exercising is fun. I'd buy these again.

items.summary: Have no idea what all the fuss is about
items.text: Have no idea what all the fuss is about with these. I don't know, maybe I just bought the wrong size, but these are so uncomfortable. They dig into my toes and I always end up with blisters. Their cute but will look elsewhere.

items.summary: It was really hard to find the right siz
items.text: It was really hard to find the right size for these. I had to send them back 3 times before I got a pair that fit. Really aggravating!!!  I ended up having to get two sizes larger than I usually wear and a wide, which I've never worn before in my life. Sizing is messed up do yourself a favor, go to the store and try them on.
VERY LIGHTWEIGHT COMFY-GOOD SHOES

items.summary: Wore these for a year and they started f
items.text: Wore these for a year and they started falling apart. For the price I guess I'll just get another pair cuz I do like them. But I think a shoe should last longer. It's not like I can take my sneakers to a cobbler haha

items.summary: Ummm, fashion? If you say so. They're co
items.text: Ummm, fashion? If you say so. They're comfy and all, but these shoes are hideous.

items.summary: Cute and comfortable definitely. The ela
items.text: Cute and comfortable definitely. The elastic streteched out a bit too much but I still wear them.

items.summary: Love love LOVE!!!  I can't get enough of
items.text: Love love LOVE!!!  I can't get enough of these shoes. They are SUPER comfy and go with everything!

items.summary: I couldn't live without these. I wear th
items.text: I couldn't live without these. I wear them everywhere, not just running. They feel like I don't have anything on my feet, and their so, so comfortble.

items.summary: These are really well made and so lightw
items.text: These are really well made and so lightweight. I'll definitely be buying more of these.

items.summary: Want these in every single color Luma ma
items.text: Want these in every single color Luma makes! I am the first to say that I'm a couch potatoe, I don't run at all. I wear these to the mall for shopping instead. :)

items.summary: I love these for when I walk the boardwa
items.text: I love these for when I walk the boardwalk with my grandaughter. They seem pretty hip and I got lots of compliments on them from the ladies at the bingo night

items.summary: These looked really ugly on my feet when
items.text: These looked really ugly on my feet when I got them. The picture online is much more flattering than the reality. I'm bummed.

items.summary: I can appreciate the concept, but I thin
items.text: I can appreciate the concept, but I think I'll be going back to regular laced sneakers from now on, they just didn't seem to fit my feet as well I guess because my feet are so narrow. People with narrow feet shouldn't buy these!

items.summary: Don't like the strap on top; gets too lo
items.text: Don't like the strap on top; gets too loose sometimes

items.summary: Love the no laces and they feel really g
items.text: Love the no laces and they feel really good- wear em all the time!

items.summary: Velcro straps?? Are you kidding me? Am I
items.text: Velcro straps?? Are you kidding me? Am I two years old? The bottom is cool though!

items.summary: Cool-looking kicks! I'd wear them anywhe
items.text: Cool-looking kicks! I'd wear them anywhere not just the gym or running. They'll look great with everything!

items.summary: I absolutely love these trainers. I can
items.text: I absolutely love these trainers. I can get on the gym floor so quick becuz i don't have to tie any annoying ties.

items.summary: Have had these for quite a while and the
items.text: Have had these for quite a while and they're still my go-to pair for every morning jog. Really hold up well and still feel good.

items.summary: Really comfy and awesome for running or
items.text: Really comfy and awesome for running or checking out trails at the park.

items.summary: Love a preppy sneaker! These are still a
items.text: Love a preppy sneaker! These are still adorable but not as casual as running shoes! Love them!

items.summary: These are my favorite new pair of sneake
items.text: These are my favorite new pair of sneakers! I just hate that they get dirty really fast.

items.summary: These look awesome with EVERYTHING! Hone
items.text: These look awesome with EVERYTHING! Honestly, there's nothing you can wear that won't look perfect with these. Preppy and retro! Love them!

items.summary: The suede upper makes these pretty hard
items.text: The suede upper makes these pretty hard to wear if its raining outside! The sneaker designers really weren't thinking on this one. Cute design though!

items.summary: Beyond perfection! I always get tons of
items.text: Beyond perfection! I always get tons of compliments when I wear these out.

items.summary: So comfortable I almost feel barefoot. T
items.text: So comfortable I almost feel barefoot. The treads on these is so intricate and deep, so they can be hard to clean.

items.summary: On the plus side, the perforated cushion
items.text: On the plus side, the perforated cushioning  is really soft and reduces friction. However, they seem to absorb sweat and don't dry very quickly, which causes a lot of odor.

items.summary: I threw them out when the mushy lining s
items.text: I threw them out when the mushy lining started to ooze.
These pants are so cute! I like them better for lounging than exercising, though. The material gets a little too hot when I'm working out.

items.summary: good for PJs but that's about it
items.text: good for PJs but that's about it
These are my favorite pants. Super cute and soooo comfy.
These are soft and stretchy enough but don't draw sweat away.
I bought these for yoga but they make better pajama bottoms. I like a tighter fit for yoga.
Love the cut and the high waistband. Bye bye, muffin top!
My favorite part of the day is when I get to come home, take my work pants off and slip these on. Sooo soft and perfect for relaxing.

LOVE, LOVE, LOVE. They are so comfy and good for anything. I have two toddlers, so I rarely get a chance to finish my morning stretches and yoga, let alone get changed afterward before I get interrupted by my kids. Sometimes I will be making lunch and realize that I'm still wearing these! They're so comfy and good for anything. It's nice to know that if I need to run out on a quick errand, I won't look like a total bum even if I forgot to change.
NOT flattering. My boyfriend bought me these cuz he loves the way yoga pants look. I wore them once and he said I should return them then we broke up :(
I literally have about 5 pairs of these in my drawer. I don't just wear them to yoga though. Oh no! I wear them on a normal Saturday around town. Love them!

These pants move so well! They provide nice coverage so when I'm in Downward Dog, I don't have to worry. I don't know about this Cooltech technology though. I sweat in them, so they definitely don't keep me dry. They're pretty warm!
I wear them once and the seams started to separate! Not constructed well at all. With the kazillion other yoga pants out there, there's no excuse for this!
Guys. I have like 10 pairs of these cause they're so comfy, natch! Please make more colors!
I bought these to hang out in not for yoga. yoga is for hippees!

items.summary: I can't stop lookin in the mirror!
items.text: I can't stop lookin in the mirror!
Awesome bottoms for working out or just relaxing at the house.
I'm not a fan of really tight or compressed pants so I love these for my yoga classes (not so much for hot yoga, though).

items.summary: Great fit - love the v-neck design!
items.text: Great fit - love the v-neck design!
Some of the seams bother me during certain workouts but otherwise very comfortable
I would never wear this bra to anything but a low impact class like yoga. There's zero support and absolutely no modesty. Was hoping for better!
Definitely not good for anything high-impact, but it's very stylish for yoga or something else low impact.
This is in regular rotation at the gym. Its colorful and looks kinda cute under my exercise tanks.
I do a lot of different exercises and this tank - I have 2 of them - is one of my favorites. It's really soft and stays drier than other tops I've had.

items.summary: Makes me feel so snug! WHOO!
items.text: Makes me feel so snug! WHOO!
Could be flirtier.
Watch out if you're shapely like me - this tiny thing makes it hard to breath!
I love the look of this top, but I wasn't too crazy about the fit. The medium was too big in my opinion.
I don't know why the arm holes are so big. It looked ok in the photo but in person they're really wide. It's really comfortable but that bugs me.
Super cute!!!  I love it and want more colors. I really like running in this tank because it's not too tight.

items.summary: A sweet n sporty look for the gym
items.text: Always a sweet n sporty look for the gym! Keeps me cool and the seams don't rub up against me like some of my other tanks.
Good choice for working out and stylin' enough to wear when I'm hanging with friends on hot days. Also washes really well!
unflattering. Ugh. The elastic was literaly digging into my skin. I got my exact size so I thought I'd be good. All set.
Makes me feel like I'm wearing a training bra. Comfy though.
I had to order 3 sizes before I found my fit. The sizes do NOT line up. I did like it in the end. Just took too long to get there.
So, it doesn't say that theres no shelf bra. BEWARE! Other than that, cute gym top.
Cute, stretchy top! Perfect for people with zero body fat.
I am a compulsive hoarder of workout gear so of course I had to have this in every color. I feel better after I buy them all because it's a good price!
If I could wear this sports bra every day, I definitely would. It's so so comfortable and washes well.
It's an average bra-nothing to write home about. I don't like how the straps dig into my shoulders, and it really doesn't provide that much support.
I wish they made this bra with patterns because I like to look good at the gym. This is a little blah, but still cute. I would never wear it by itself.
Doesn't fit me. Luma fail.
does not fit. worthless.
So, so awesome. Great Support! I just can't wait for the day that I'm comfortable enough with my midriff to wear this sans shirt, because the pattern is really cute!!
I have a B cup and I love how this bra feels! It has a really firm fit but it doesn't feel too tight. I wish every bra felt like this!
Not exactly true to size but still very comfortable.

items.summary: Snug fit without being too tight
items.text: Snug fit without being too tight and no irritation or chafing.
I play field hockey and it gets crazy hot outside - bra stays comfy and pretty dry. Recommended!

items.summary: One of my favorites b/c no chafing!
items.text: One of my favorites b/c no chafing!
This shirt is very light but a TIGHT fit! Almost compression-tight.
Really like the seams. Looks and feels awesome!
Really close-fitting. Do not love.
Soooooooooooooo light!
Cute.

items.summary: I really dig this shirt for races
items.text: I really dig this shirt for races, it makes me feel like I'm flying.

What I rally love here is that it does the job of keeping me cool and dry.  I'm a big guy and sweat A LOT! Even after a day of gulf, I'm still dry and comfortable. The problem is that the sleeves are very tight - actually bought a second shirt because i split the armpit/sleeve area of the first. Do yourself a favor and order a size bigger.
Not great - buttons are too small and hurt my fingers trying to button it. I've seen better designs...

What a versatile shirt! Not only does it feel very soft compared to my old worn out polos, but it also does the job promised. I like going out after my gamefor drinks so I look good then too and don't need to change into something fresh.

items.summary: Love the fabric, but it's huge!
items.text: Love the fabric, but it's huge! I look like a homeless person in it.
seriously, I can't get over how soft this tank top is. Do you have anything else made with it?

items.summary: omg I love this tank top, it's perfect
items.text: omg I love this tank top, it's perfect for running and yoga. The fabric is so soft and stretchy!

items.summary: who doesn't love a racerback, amiright?!
items.text: who doesn't love a racerback, amiright?!

items.summary: I where this AAALLLLL the time
items.text: I where this AAALLLLL the time to workout! Its so comfy and cute! I just wish it was a little longer.
soft but a little tight for my liking.
Sooooooooooo soft! Nice and long too.
Cute, comfy. A little overpriced though.

items.summary: I love that it's so lightweight.
items.text: I love that it's so lightweight. I can wear it under jackets and vests without feeling like a stuffed sausage.
Thank you! I'm so sick of inappropriate workout clothes. This is exactly what I was looking for. Cover yourselves up, ladies!
Um, NOT flattering at ALL. Too tight and short.

items.summary: Like the color .sleeves were too tight.
items.text: Like the color .sleeves were too tight. felt constricted.
There's a ton of other t-shirts I'd choose over this one. It's not soft at all and the fabric feels like sandpaper next to my skin-was really hoping for better.

items.summary: This T is a no brainer-solid color
items.text: This T is a no brainer-solid color, pairs with everything, and keeps me cool. What more could I want during my run?
What's with the sleeve cut? I don't even have linebacker shoulders but I feel like the sleeves are cutting off circulation to my arms!
Light, comfy, does a good job shedding sweat.
I have broad, strong shoulders and this top is one of the very few that flatters my build. 5 stars for sure!
My fiance accidentally put this on when he was getting dressed and it fit him better than it fits me??
I do think the fabric is great for sports but the cut and style are weeeird.

items.summary: Doesn't help my figure one bit
items.text: The contored design is NOT really contored. I rarely wear this top out because it doesn't do anything for my figure.

items.summary: This shirt is decent for running
items.text: This shirt is pretty good! I'm a long distance runner and it keeps me pretty comfortable, although these companies always act like their shirts are magical and really it's just pretty basic stuff. Still it's a decent shirt and I would recommend it. Just don't expect it to change your life.
fits kind of awkward wish it was longer
So I have a really large head and I love this shirt bc the neckline is so stretchy! Honestly I have gotten stuck in other running shirts with the really small collar hahahahaha so embarrassing!!! !!
OK this jacket is REALLY lightweight. But if it's really cold, you have to wear it with baselayers or you'll freeze. It's a good buy, but be prepared!
Looks good and feels good. It's nice for skiing because it blocks the wind and keeps you warm, but doesn't get too hot after you start sweating.

I have never worn such a comfortable jacket!!!  It's really thin and moves well with your body, I have no idea how it manages to keep you so warm. And if you'll be in really cold weather, you can easily add some extra layers underneath and still be comfortable.

items.summary: This is the most dependable piece I own.
items.text: This is the most dependable piece I own. You'll rarely me without this on. (except in the summer)
This really doesn't deliver on the insulating part. I can't say I would throw this on in really chilly temperatures-need a coat.

items.summary: Perfect, perfect, perfect in every way.
items.text: Perfect, perfect, perfect in every way. I love the quilting and it keeps me toasty warm.
I don't know if this jacket would be good for a whole day outside in the snow. It says waterproof but mine got pretty soaked one day when it was raining.
I agree with that other reviewer. I get very overheated while wearing this jacket while shoveling snow.
I'm into the colors cause they're great for night skiing-but I overheated really fast in this jacket
The actual color is brighter than it looks in the photo, but thats why I like it for jogging in the neighborhood at night
my fave part is the back pocket. I needed a place to keep my cell phone safe when I run

items.summary: Everyone loves this jacket on me
items.text: I got this jacket for tennis practice since its in my schools color and everyone on the team loves it!!

items.summary: I wear this pretty much every day!
items.text: I wear this pretty much every day! The material is really soft and it goes with everything!
It's called not making clothes that are boxy and unflattering. Heard of it?
It's a little short for my loooooooooooooong torso, but it's still comfy and cute. Good for short runs.
Makes me look like a square. Literally, like a square shape.
This is my go-to jacket when I'm running in the rain or cold! It's warm but lightweight, totally waterproof, and I love the colors!
Super warm. My mom bought this for me for when I have to go watch my stupid brother play middle school football in 30 degree weather.
This is REALLY comfortable! It's a little too bulky to run or bike in, but for cold-weather hikes it's awesome.
Thumb holes rock!

I love wearing fleece, but I hate how it pills and picks up fluff and cat hair. This hoodie is perfect, because it's a fleece on the inside and a sweater on the outside. I wear it around the house all the time in the winter.
Great hoodie for hiking and camping in the fall. I really wish the pockets were bigger, though, I can't get my hands in them when I'm wearing gloves.
I wear this to class so often, my friend asked me if I actually own any other shirts!

items.summary: it's so light and really long!
items.text: it's so light and really long! I wear it with jeans, yoga pants, whatever!
Love the material, but the hood kind of flops around. I should have bought the t-shirt instead of the hoodie.
Can I please wear this every day?! Would that be weird? It's fitted, which is awesome because I hate frumpy sweatshirts. And the fleece is a dream!
Mine shrunk to! :( I gave it to my little sister.
So annoyed! I loved this, but then it shrunk after I washed it once! It's adorable but now the sleeves are too short. Returning. :(
OMG, I've found my new fave zip up!! I live in this thing! I'm just mad their arent more colors.
Definitely not as warm as I hoped, but its super soft. I'll wear it when I need another layer.
This is my go-to jacket when I'm running in the morning. It keeps me warm and is ultra comfy.
The mp3 pocket barely fits my device. I was hoping for a slightly larger pocket.
Walking our St. Benard is pretty serious exercise - you WILL sweat trying to keep up with him. This hoodie keeps me just warm enough and doesn't get bogged down with sweat. Love it!
Perfect for fall weather jogs or walks on cool evenings. The sweat-wicking fabric works wonders, keeps the hoodie dry after you've cooled down so you're not cold and wet (which I can't stand).
So I borrowed this from my mom and I have to say It's not my style but I was super cold and it did the job.
The sleeves are definitely thicker than you realize, which is a good thing! The photo is a little misleading because it makes the hoodie look thin but it's really quite substantial! Great value.
im planning on buying another one of these in another color. the best hoodie ive ever owned.
The fleece fabric is really nice, but I hate the short-sleeve design. Can you please make this with long sleeves? It'll keep me warmer!
This is definitely my favorite hoodie in my closet. I wouldn't wear it if it was freezing out, but it's a great extra layer on normal mornings.
It's kinda average and I don't know if I would get it again. With the right color combination, it might look ok, but the combo I have and the short sleeve style doesn't make it very stylish.
The fabric stains easily but otherwise I'm a big fan. I don't usually like to wear pullovers but the zipper makes it easy to get on and off.
I usually just wear it to class but it's definitely comfortable and light enough that you could work out in it.
Honestly this hoodie is okay but I do not get thezipper. Why not just make a full length zipper? I would rather have no zipper.

items.summary: I can't get enough of this hoodie
items.text: I can't get enough of this hoodie. It's so comfortable, I hate taking it off! I'm buying it in more colors now so that I can wear it more without people realizing that I wear the same thing every day ;)
Not really flattering for my body type

This hoodie may be the softest thing I've ever touched! It's so perfect for curling up on a chilly day. I wore it hiking on a really cold day last November and it kept me really warm. My only issue is that it's kind of plain and unflattering. I would love to wear it all the time but it makes me look a little frumpy. Luma, I need this fabric with a more stylish design!
Rides up a bit during workouts but otherwise it's pretty comfy! I like the hood.
Great for cooler runs.
I literally wear this everywhere even out to dinner!

items.summary: These are really REALLY LIGHT! Not much
items.text: These are really REALLY LIGHT! Not much shoe or cushioning. My calves were sore after running in them 5 miles the first time.

items.summary: Not great on slippery grass. I wear them
items.text: Not great on slippery grass. I wear them mostly for walking around.

items.summary: I used these as racing flats and they we
items.text: I used these as racing flats and they were awesome.

items.summary: Awesome shoes!! I didn't realize how muc
items.text: Awesome shoes!! I didn't realize how much I'd been missing by wearing other shoes without a lot of heel cushioning. I'm sticking with these from now on.

items.summary: They ran too narrow for me and the mater
items.text: They ran too narrow for me and the material was almost too light - seemed pretty flimsy and I don't think they would last very long.

items.summary: How awesome is it to find a product that
items.text: How awesome is it to find a product that works exactly as advertised! These seriously felt like I'd been wearing them forever, the first time I put them on. The way it molds to your foot is amazing. I have run two full marathons in these with barely a blister. GO LUMA!

items.summary: I wouldn't be a runner if it wasn't for
items.text: I wouldn't be a runner if it wasn't for these shoes. I used to get really bad shin splints, blisters and pulled muscles no matter how much I stretched. Once I bought these it got so much eaiser. It is true that they are not that stylish but if you are serious about running, who cares?

items.summary: I wear these for a variety of sports and
items.text: I wear these for a variety of sports and they are very comfortable, no complaints there. I'm not crazy about the design though. In person they look kind of feminine. Plus the color is no bueno. They somehow looked dirty and old even fresh out of the box.

items.summary: These are really good to play tennis in
items.text: These are really good to play tennis in too. They fit a little narrow in the heel which was fine for me but might be a problem for others.

items.summary: I wore these until they finally gave out
items.text: I wore these until they finally gave out! Great running shoes..very comfortable and light and I could feel the difference the Torsion system makes. Highly recommended for anyone going out 4 to 5 times a week.

items.summary: Love, love, love - did I say love? It wa
items.text: Love, love, love - did I say love? It was totally worth it to wait for Luma to come out with a trail running shoe. Very comfortable.

items.summary: I slipped on a rock on these shoes and I
items.text: I slipped on a rock on these shoes and I could feel all the pain. I would go out running on a regular day in these but not if it's been previously raining.

items.summary: The only thing I don't like about these
items.text: The only thing I don't like about these shoes are the weird toes. They point upward making it look really strange on a guy. Otherwise very good.

items.summary: Running in these are imPOSSible!! I only
items.text: Running in these are imPOSSible!! I only can run 23 minutes at a time, but these hurt when I even do that. They look pretty snazzy though, lots of compliments from the ladies on my route.

items.summary: Pretty average cts. Their comfrtable whe
items.text: Pretty average cts. Their comfrtable when I first start but don't try working out too hard in them. You're feet will definitely start to hurt!

items.summary: I wear these to my gym daily. I go hard
items.text: I wear these to my gym daily. I go hard on the treadmill and these don't let me down.

items.summary: The only things I care about when I'm ru
items.text: The only things I care about when I'm running are comfort and speed. These are definitely comfortable but I don't think their lightweight enough to give me great speed. And the search continues.

items.summary: Great! I wear these almost every day-esp
items.text: Great! I wear these almost every day-especially love that I don't have to worry about the laces.

items.summary: These sit in my foyer waiting for my eve
items.text: These sit in my foyer waiting for my everyday run. Sometimes I run 5 miles in them, sometimes 10. They never let me down.
They work great in water but I also like to wear em on hotter days if we're walking around and regular sandals will let too much debris get in.
We go boating a lot and these are great for when I'm putting our boat in the water. Those tiny rocks and pebbles can be super sharp but I never feel a single one of them.
These do drain well and are really comfortable but the bottoms can still be slippery if you're walking on wet rocks. Just be careful!
THESE PANTS KEEP ME WARM WHEN IM BENCHED AT MY GAME! I DON'T GET TO PLAY A LOT. LOL
Good dog walking pants

items.summary: The draw string is more like half a draw
items.text: The draw string is more like half a draw string. Dosent stay so pants fall of my butt. I think they run too big.
These are great! Major major points for the two-tone design plus all those technologies - I never feel gross after my runs. A must have for anyone serious about their body!

items.summary: I bought these for my man.
items.text: I bought these for my man. What can I say, these pants keep him comfortable and dry. Never heard any complaints except that he wishes they stretched more. Good buy!
I like them, they keep my sweat on the down low. They are stretchy. And I like the pockets. They look cool, too. So yeah. Go buy them.
There's nothing to dislike about these track pants bc they do everything you want??blocks the wind and keeps you warm. Very happy I got them!
The mesh lining sometimes snags when your taking them off but that's pretty common I think. Like them and would recommend.
These are really bulky and not very flattering at all. It looks like I have a big bulge at my stomach. I wear them around the house but I wouldn't go out in public with them on.
Either I'm too short or this inseam is way off. WAY too long! I trip constantly in these.
They do the job of keeping me warm before a game. I wear them then and only then-wouldn't wear them anywhere else.
They chafed me!
Don't know why people on here are so negative about these pants. They are comfy and feel very lightweight and soft. The internal pocket is great for cash when I need to refeul during runs!
After running in these saggy pants I just wanted to crawl into a hole a die.

Ok, MAYBE this is just me but I sweat a LOT when I run, and I've noticed that this shirt really retains odor.  I washed it three times and it still stank so I had to just throw it away. Which sucks because I really liked it, but come on!
wish it was longer. i'm 5'11 with a long torso and it's too short.
I'd prefer if it was Racerback, but otherwise it's a great shirt. The Mesh zones are where you need them when you really get Sweaty.

items.summary: Fits true to size, feels great.
items.text: Fits true to size, feels great. I bought three and I won't wear anything else when I'm training.
Not as lightweight as it seems but it was ok. Comfortable.

items.summary: I bought a few of these for my husband.
items.text: I bought a few of these for my husband. He likes them but they did shrink when washed. I just don't put them in the dryer anymore and it's fine!
Why is the neck opening so small??? Didn't fit right.
Unless ur really muscular this won't look good. I'm keeping it cuz it's motivation to keep working out. But skinny dudes be warned.
The fabric is great when I'm sweating hard. It keeps me feeling dry. Wish there was more ventilation.

items.summary: I feel awesome when I wear this
items.text: I feel awesome when I wear this to hit the gym!!!  The cut makes my triceps look huge. It's so rewarding to look in the mirror after a really tough workout. My girlfriend says I look like a lunkhead but I know she loves it!!
Honestly, could this be any more unflattering? The cut is really bad and I can't see anyone looking good in this unless they're really muscular.
I've only worn it a few times so far, but it really keeps me comfortable at the gym. I throw on a pair of athletic shorts and call it a day.
I agree with the reviewer above. You can get this same tank in a million other stores, nothing to write home about. Do like the top stitching though-really adds some athleticsm.
It's just an average tank. Nothing really to say about it. I rarely work out so I can't speak to the moisture-wicking part.

items.summary: I love this shirt. Perfect fit
items.text: I love this shirt. Perfect fit, perfect price. My dad plays on a softball team and I got one for him and he is very happy too. has my vote!

On the plus side, it's definitely comfortble and soft,  and yes it does keep you dry  no matter how much you sweat. However, I found the cuffs to be too tight and the material is a little too sheer for my tastes. But it's not the most expensive on the shelf, so whatever.
It's okay, a little boring.

It is very comfy but wears thin - I won't be able to get much more use out it as it now is revealing my bra I think. I have the white one so I will switch to a darker color if I decide to by another 1. Very embarrassing when your at the gym.
I sweat SO much. This top is fine when I don't intend to exert myself, but BOY does it NOT work for people with hyperhydrosis!

items.summary: This shirt is too tight and too thin.
items.text: This shirt is too tight and too thin. REALLY emphasizes the fact that I do not have clearly defined pectorals.
Great training top. I like that it also has UV protection because I'm outdoors all the time. Seems are a little weird tho.

items.summary: Luma got it right with this one.
items.text: Luma got it right with this one. I don't care about looking stylish, I just want a shirt that will still feel good after an hour at the gym, and that's what I got.

items.summary: Ripped the FIRST TIME I wore
items.text: This shirt ripped the FIRST TIME I wore it.
Really comfy shirt, sometimes clings a bit but at least it dries fast.
Fits great. It's my new favorite CrossFit shirt.
Works for the gym and even as an undershirt.
I got this for running, but the fit is kind of funny so I just end up wearing it for yard work. It's light enough, just nothing special.
Nice and light. I like that there's no obnoxious design.

items.summary: I bought 5 of the same color!
items.text: People at the gym probably think I don't wwas my cloths because I wear this evryday but I just bought 5 of the same color because it's awesome!
I like this shirt, it keeps me cool when I'm lifting. Would like a tighter fit though.

items.summary: Gets the job done. Even when I'm pouring
items.text: Gets the job done. Even when I'm pouring sweat, this shirt maintains a nice dry feel. I think the sizing runs a little large, so order accordingly.

I got this shirt in the v-neck version too and I like the crew a lot better. It seems to fit better and I think the fabric is lighter. This one doesn't have the mesh inserts but allover the fabric feels better.

Why is this kind of fabric all the rage? I know it's supposed to be the best thing since sliced bread with the moisture wicking crap but I feel like I sweat MORE than with just regular cotton. I'm over paying an arm and a leg for the "technology." give me a 5 dollar tshirt from the dollar store!
Yea. This pilled imeddiately after I washed it. Definatly returning.

items.summary: Why can't you make this in my size?
items.text: Why can't you make this in my size? Thank you for the color at least.
Wear this on evening runs. I absolutely adore it and will probably buy more.
I work out a lot and my shoulders are really big, most tank tops are too tight in the armholes but this one is great.
Nice fit and fabric, but the inserts are in weird places.

items.summary: I purchased this tank top for my son
items.text: I purchased this tank top for my son when he's working out in the gym after school. It fits great and he loves it!
I've lost 50 pounds in 5 months and this shirt kept me comfortable since day one. I would recommend it to anyone serious about workout. Sizes run small tho so order a size up.
I don't even know where to begin. It fell apart during the third wash. Whoever says this is a good-quality piece of gear is lying through their teeth!
This is a fantastic shirt for the price!

items.summary: This shirt is a dream come true
items.text: This shirt is a dream come true for a sweat bucket like me. Love the material and I don't look like I got stuck in the rain when I'm done working out.
Awesome tee! Not the cheapest though.

items.summary: Liked the way it fit mostly
items.text: Liked the way it fit mostly. But the collar was weird. I guess it kept me dry?
As soon as I put this shirt on I feel ready to hit the gym, even on my laziest days. Something about the way it feels just gets me psyched up!

I'm a bodybuilder with extremely large, buff muscles and this shirt simply does not accommodate my bulk. Even with the V neck it's too tight around my neck, and the sleeve openings were practically cutting off circulation to my biceps and triceps! I had to send it back but I have to admit that felt good ;)
it says moisturewicking but i still sweat when i wear this shirt, don't trust what you read on the internet

I'm an avid hiker/snowboarder and know quality when I see it. Please don't be fooled by the thin feel of this jacket - I always feel very comfortable and only rarely feel too warm, and then it's only because I wear insulating base layers. You will not be disappointed, especially if you're into winter sports or outdoor activities at higher elevations. My only issue with it is the zipper, which broke and had to be replaced.

items.summary: This jacket isn't keeping me warm
items.text: This jacket isn't keeping me warm
Not sure exactly what "elements" they're talking about here. I don't feel protected from any "elements" in this throw-away.

items.summary: I just live for this track jacket
items.text: I just live for this track jacket. Because it's solid, I can put it on over any t-shirt and look really athletic. I may not exercise all the time, but wearing this jacket makes other people think I do!

Not 100% sure how I feel about this yet so I'm going to number it right in the middle. It keeps me warm but the fleece is kind of itchy. It definitely has to go on top of another layer or you'll spend all day itching!
The fleece lining is what sold me! I hate being cold and this jacket really helps me not to be. Almost perfect-the hem slightly unraveled which is preventing me from giving it a 5.

I went back to the site and snagged another in a different color - they're great on my evening rides. I usually prefer raglan sleeves but I am always comfortable in this design, and the mesh works wonders for keeping my temperature down.
I'd give it 4 or 5 stars if it wasn't for the fact that the effing  loop thing broke. It wasn't stretchy enough and now im back to carrying my fone and sweating on it ughghg!

items.summary: Love it; don't have to take off gloves
items.text: Love it; don't have to take my gloves off and dig around in my pocket for my ipod
Wish the buttons were on the sleeve but still very cool. Jacket is way warm too
Kinda bulky when you wear both, but they still let me move ok. Great for football games.
I like this one. It's easy to take apart when you want to wear the quilted part and zips back in no problem. If you're a big guy its fits a little tight under the arms though.
This jacket does everything it's supposed to do. Keeps me warm and has lots of room for my stuff. Good buy!

items.summary: I didn't think it was that warm
items.text: I didn't think it was that warm at all and it needs a hood. I wouldn't wear it in the winter that's for sure.

items.summary: for my son to wear to school
items.text: I got this for my son to wear to school and it's treated him very well. Not too bulky and the reversible design is a very nice touch!
This jacket is going to be by my side for the rest of my life. It's never let me down once in a rainstorm, always keeping me dry as I bike back and forth to work.
I have to say this is a practically perfect rain jacket. I do wish it was heavier though since it only works for me in spring and summer rainstorms.
Excellent quality. I actually love when it rains because I get a lot of compliments whenever I wear this jacket.
Perfect layer for wearing to the game, it doesn't shed all over your clothes like a regular hoodie.
the fabric is great, it keeps me warm but it's not bulky like my other hoodies. Runs large, though.
This is one of my favorite layers for running in the winter, it keeps me warm but it's not super bulky.
I where it when I'm coaching football so I can run up and down the sidelines and yell without getting to hot. The pocket on the chest is weird looking tho.
Even though I'm a fan of classic/traditional styles, I bought this watch for something different since it's fun and I could really use for tracking my sprints. I have no complaints!

my buckle BROKE off the 2nd time I wore it. And then I had issues getting a replacement even with the warranty. Luma needs to stick to clothing basics because they clearly are out of their league with the more technical stuff. UGH

It died after  a week of infuriating malfunctionality! First that little plastic screen that houses the numbers - yeah. it popped off in 24 hours. Okay, no problem i thought, i'll just not touch any thing vital. Then the metal back popped off and landed in the toilet so there was just no recovering that. THEN  the buckle broke! In the trash it went!
The strap broke, which made me think I have fat wrists but I don't.
Pieces kept coming off.

I bought this watch specifically for its band because I have really small wrists and have a hard time finding watches that fit, even ones that say women's. This one fit wonderfully and I could even make it smaller!
Super sleek, love it. I'm buying another as a gift!
I bought this watch for my mom to workout with and she loves it. It's not too difficult for her to set and she uses it all the time now.

items.summary: Keeps excellent time and is pretty tough
items.text: Keeps excellent time and is pretty tough! Still no scratches or scuffs after a year of wearing it.

items.summary: Has been through quite a few adventures
items.text: Has been through quite a few adventures and vacations with me and still looks and runs great. That includes plenty of trips to water parks with the kids!
I recently replace my 25 year old watch with this one, so it had high expectations to live up to. So far all the features are working flawlessly, I only hope it lasts as long as my old one.
can't say this is the coolest looking watch I've ever owned (it's no FAMOUS DESIGNER or anything) but it has a lot to offer technology-wise
This was given as a gift to me and it wasn't the one I asked for, but I'm starting to like the different perks like the hydration alarm
When I'm in another country, I hate not knowing what time it really is back home so the dual time zone settings are awesome!
Really perfect for my needs. I travel a ton, so I'll always know what time to give my wife a call back home.

items.summary: I really like the modern look
items.text: I really like the modern look of this watch, but I could only get one time zone to work. I hope it has a warranty because I'm sending it back!
This watch is so tight around my wrist! I don't care if it's adjustable, it cuts off my circulation.

items.summary: It works ok but the ugliness is blinding
items.text: It works ok but the ugliness is blinding I am literally blinded
Watch too tight please email how to loosen it or I'll leave bad review
I got it because I thought it would still make a ticktick noise even though it's digital, but it doesn't!

I run 5 times a day and am OBSESSED with this watch! It tracks and calculates all the things my brain can't because I hate maths. PS I know this is a men's watch and I am not a man, but I have large wrists!
This thing is awesome and remembers all the stuff I've stored.

items.summary: It slides around on my wrist
items.text: It slides around on my wrist when I sweat. I've tried making it smaller but that doesn't seem to help.

items.summary: Not a bad watch for the price
items.text: Not a bad watch for the price. Wish it had actual numbers instead of marks, though.
Hands down, it's the only watch I wear when I'm out on a run. The strap is soft and smooth, and the face even glows in the dark.

items.summary: Too lazy to go to gym
items.text: I use these when I'm too lazy to go to the gym. Really helps me stay in shape. I have already adjusted several times to increase the tension because I'm getting stronger!
Tried to adjust one and the plastic part just snapped in half. Very Disappointed. Do not buy!
They work, nothing special. I had a set that I liked better but my ex stole it.
OBSESSED with this! I love that it's adjustable! A bit more expensive than I wanted, but TOTALLY worth it.
This totally makes me feel like I'm actually working my muscles. The adjustable thing is awesome. A bit pricey though.

items.summary: I hate working out...This does not help.
items.text: I hate working out...This does not help.it gets tangled really easily.can't even get threw 1 work out with it. Returning.
I bought these pushup grips because they came in purple!! my boyfriend has his own and I love using them but the purple was so perfect for me because I'm a girly girl at heart
these are ok, but my brother has the military ones and I like them loads better
these things whip you into shape! a month after I got them and used them several times aeach week I could see a huge difference in my muscle tone. very happy with the results!!!  :)
Its great to be able to work out at home and sometimes on my lunch break at work - I wish this provided more resistance, though.
Agreed. I can do plenty of exercises with it and its awesome for when I can't make it to the gym, but I'd like more resistance, too.
pretty satisfied with this jump rope. good value for the price

items.summary: I BRING THIS TO ALL MY MEETS!
items.text: I BRING THIS TO ALL MY MEETS FOR WARMUP!!! BARELY TAKES UP ANY SPACE IN MY BAG

items.summary: perfect for when I'm too lazy
items.text: this is so perfect for when I'm too lazy to go to the gym. I do a few pushups and then whip out the jump rope and work on my cardio. It's a quick workout that makes me feel greaat and I don't even have to leave the house
I always found 10 lb weights too light and 20 lb too heavy. This is just right!
I don't know why I didn't get this years ago. I've been diligently doing ab workouts every day with little effect. Incorporated this into my routine and BAM! I can see my love handles melting away!
Wide mouth opening makes it easy to clean!

items.summary: I bike four miles a day to work and back
items.text: I bike four miles a day to work and back and I love this thing. It's a good size and it's pretty comfortable to wear across my back while I ride. So far I have not noticed much wear and tear on the fabric and I've had it for 6 months.

items.summary: I would love this bag EXCEPT . . .
items.text: I would love this bag EXCEPT with the case on my Iphone won't fit in the cell phone pocket! Why make a pocket for cell phones if it's not going to fit an Iphone.
Its fine I guess but it's really ugly, I picked out a really cute bag for college but my mom got me this one instead.
This bag is definitely not waterproof. I accidentally left it outside in a downpour, and my clothes got soaked. I'm disappointed!

I really love how roomy the duffle is. I'm a clotheshorse, so I like to take a lot of outfits with me when I go away. I have no problem stuffing it all in. It's not a very stylish bag, but it serves its purpose.
It doesn't hold that much, so it's really just good for a night or two away. It's also pretty plain looking, so for those who like bells and whistles, look elsewhere.
I take this along whenever I head up to my cabin. Fits tons of gear plus a few of my favorite electronics. And duct tape.

items.summary: ok bag for a day's hike
items.text: ok bag for a day's hike around Hawk Mountain. Needs a sturdier top handle tho, things ripped

items.summary: I bought this backpack for my daughter
items.text: I bought this backpack for my daughter who's going to college this year. Her campus is huge and I was concerned that she would hurt her back lugging all those books around. It seems like there's enough padding!

items.summary: I heart this backpack so hard.
items.text: I heart this backpack so hard. The colors are soooo cute and there's enough room for all my stuff xoxo
I would give this bag zero stars if I could!!!  All of the zippers fell off the first tim I used it!!!  DON'T BUY THIS

items.summary: What's not to like about this bag?!!
items.text: What's not to like about this bag?!! It's simple, clean and modern, and it fits me perfeclty. The roominess is a big plus when I make multiple trips to the gym then the grocery store then wherever else. LOVE IT!

I must have a floor model or soemthin cuz when I ordered it it came all stained up, some brown crust or somethin. Gross. I requested a refund so we'll see. Other than that I think it's a quality bag, just disappointed with mine.
I purchased this bag hoping it would give me more motivation to go to the gym and it has! Not too big, sized just right for me and all my friends love it :)
Wish it had more pockets, but it's still good. A shoulder strap would also have been nice.

items.summary: I love this bag! It's cute
items.text: I love this bag! It's cute and doesn't advertise that I'm going to the gym like a duffel bag.

items.summary: I pack a TON of stuff
items.text: I take a TON of stuff to the gym and yoga studio. Way more than I should but this bag still allows me to carry a bunch of it. I like taking it better than any other bag.
I like it but I wish there were pockets on the inside instead of just one big space. I didn't think it would fit inside my locker but it did.

items.summary: I bought this bag for my daughter
items.text: I bought this bag for my daughter because she travels all the time and she loves it! It's easy for her to roll and carry by herself even when full.
I've taken this bag to so many places and everything still works. I hate when the threads start to come apart and the zipper gets caught after like 2 uses. So far so good!

items.summary: The material is a little thin
items.text: The material is a little thin so I'm afraid it won't last long. The zippers slide really nice and the wheels are good on the pavement. Overall a good purchase.

items.summary: I've had this thing for really long
items.text: I've had this thing for a really long time and it barely shows any signs of wear and tear. It's really big, too! I've taken it on day trips as well as short vacations and usually have no trouble finding room for my stuff.
Decent bag. I keep my stuff in it for work and the gym. It's nice and roomy. I wish it had a more sophisticated design, though. Kinda looks like it's for kids.

I can't believe they're claiming these straps are "padded." Wearing this thing to class for a semester totally screwed up my back, and my shoulders would start to ache after a few minutes where the straps dug in.

This bag is really cool. I'm an art major, so I have tons of supplies that I have to lug back and forth every day for class. I didn't think this would be big enough, but surprisingly it can hold just about all my stuff. I really like the way it looks too.

I wanted to like this bag, and it is definitely good quality, but the color is so weird in real life. From a distance it kind of looks like I just found it in a dumpster. Shame because that is the only drawback.
The shoulder strap broke the first time I used it. Awesome.
This is good for work. Holds everything I need. The fabric doesn't seem that strong, but so far so good.

items.summary: Great bag! I use it for everything!
items.text: Great bag! I use it for everything! Not sure what happened with the person who said the strap broke because mine is perfect. Maybe it was fluke? I'd return it and try another. It's been awesome for me!
Awesome bag but I found it to be smaller than I thought. I haven't felt any additional strain on my back and I use it all day long for my job.
If the back had more padding I would recommend it for everyone. You can tell the material is strong and not cheap so it's definitely worth it.

items.summary: I bought this backpack for my son
items.text: I bought this backpack for my son to take to school, but he carries it like a suitcase now! It's also really good for airplane travel.

items.summary: awesome for going back and forth
items.text: This is awesome for going back and forth to class. I live off campus and it's a longer walk, but this pack fits comfortably and I can even store my laptop in the main compartment.

items.summary: comfy and i don't feel like a loser
items.text: comfy and i don't feel like a loser carrying it.
I prefer more compartments. If you don't mind putting everything in one space, it's fine. Good for the gym.
It's a good size and I use it a lot. My only issue with it was I wanted the handles to be longer so I can wear it on my back.
